summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Fusion Labs website for ESP32-S3 smartwatch firmware updates. All core functionality, navigation, UI elements, and responsive design tested successfully.
passed_tests: Home page loads with Fusion Labs branding and hero section
Social links (GitHub/YouTube) point to correct URLs
Widget OS button navigates to /widget-os correctly
Fusion OS button navigates to /fusion-os correctly
Widget OS page displays specs for both 1.8" (WOS-180A, 368x448, SH8601) and 2.06" (WOS-206A, 410x502, CO5300) boards
Updater links navigate to /widget-os/1.8 and /widget-os/2.06 correctly
Fusion OS page shows 'Coming Soon' teaser with functional notify form
1.8" updater page shows correct board info and firmware version from latest.json
2.06" updater page shows correct board info and firmware version from latest.json
Console log toggle functionality works on updater pages
User manual sections display properly on Widget OS page
Form validation and submission works on Fusion OS notify form
